backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requirements to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing high‑level summaries of all frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based dark theme styles and CSS variables for the app’s visual appearance.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading Google Fonts and mounting the React app.
frontend/public/deploy-marker.txt: Deployment marker noting the latest deployment date and configuration fix.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the ValentineFlow experience.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHeartsBa: Generates and animates floating heart emojis using randomized positions and timing.
frontend/src/components/pages/Page1Splas: Page 1 showing apology text and a Next button at the bottom.
Page 2 showing hold‑you text with a grayscale image and a Next button.
frontend/src/components/pages/Page3Apolo: Page 3 displaying a long apology paragraph, an image, and a Next button.
frontend/src/components/pages/Page3Forgi: Empty placeholder file for a Page 3 forgive component.
frontend/src/components/pages/Page4Forgi: Page 4 showing Yes/No forgiveness prompt with moving No button and final message reveal.
frontend/src/components/pages/Page4Hug.t: Empty placeholder file for a hug-themed page component.
frontend/src/components/pages/Page5Final: Empty placeholder file intended for a final page component.
frontend/src/components/stages/Stage1.ts: Empty placeholder for Stage 1 component structure.
frontend/src/components/stages/Stage2.ts: Empty placeholder for Stage 2 component structure.
frontend/src/components/stages/Stage3Let: Empty placeholder for Stage 3 letter display component.
Wrapper applying enter/exit transition classes around page content.
frontend/src/components/ValentineFlow.ts: Controls page navigation between four apology pages with timed transitions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, wrapping AuthClient creation, login, logout, and identity state management.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based dark theme styles, custom animations, typography, and UI element styling such as buttons, images, and hearts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, initializing QueryClient and wrapping the app with InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom fonts, colors mapped to CSS variables, radius settings, and animation/typography plugins.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Node-side tooling, specifying module settings and included Vite config file.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite configuration enabling React, environment variable plugins, aliasing, build output settings, dev server proxying, and esbuild globals.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the project's goals, features, UI flow, and requirements for a dark-themed 4‑page interactive apology website.
